phrs.translation: 定向钻进；定向钻井；定向钻孔
平行光；定向光源；方位灯
方向稳定性；航向保持性；航向稳定性

sentences.sentence: Unless he was equipped with a directional microphone, he was out of earshot.
sentences.translation: 除非给他配备一个定向扬声器，否则谁也听不见他。

sentences.sentence: The faint arrows, similar to the directional markings on a tactical map, are one of the rare carry-overs from his military world.
sentences.translation: 微小的箭头类似于战术地图上的方向标记，是他的军事世界中罕见的遗留物之一。

sentences.sentence: Jets of compressed air gave the aircraft lateral and directional stability.
sentences.translation: 压缩气体喷流从侧面和正面稳定了机身。
